column4: TOP STORIES;Stung Treng (Rasmei News): Ouk Bridge
column5: located near the Cambodian-Laotian border in Siem Pang district collapsed At 3:00 pm on September 1
column6: 2018.------A senior military official at the site said that the bridge
column7: which was already damaged by rain and flood water from the accident at Laos’s hydropower dam collapsed completely on the eastern bank.------The bridge is less than a year old and was built by Cambodian military engineers.------http://www.rasmeinews.com/​ស្ពាន​ឆ្លង​ទន្លេសេកុង/
